name: gcalendar
title: Google Calendar
setup_instructions: To connect Google Calendar, you need OAuth2 credentials from Google Cloud Console.

fields.name: client_id
fields.label: Client ID
fields.help:
1. Go to Google Cloud Console
2. Create OAuth 2.0 Client ID (Desktop app)
3. Copy the Client ID

fields.name: client_secret
fields.label: Client Secret
fields.help: Copy the Client Secret from your OAuth credentials
